title: How To Make A ROBLOX GAME In 1 Line Of CODE!
transcript: here's how to make a Roblox game in just one line of code first make a script in a workspace and copy exactly what I do word for word task. spawn Tower of hell and you can also change Tower of Hell to any game you would like if you copied exactly what I did go ahead and press play and boom I got the whole Tower of Hell game to myself if this video helped you out join my Discord link to my bio
